content:
Updating your name on Netflix and Hulu is a relatively straightforward process. Here are the step-by-step guides to help you update your name on both platforms:

**Netflix:**

1. Sign in to your Netflix account on the Netflix website or mobile app.
2. Click on your profile picture or icon in the top right corner of the screen.
3. Select "Account" from the dropdown menu.
4. Scroll down to the "Membership & Billing" section.
5. Click on "Update personal information."
6. Enter your new name in the "First name" and "Last name" fields.
7. Click "Save" to update your information.

**Hulu:**

1. Sign in to your Hulu account on the Hulu website or mobile app.
2. Click on your profile picture or icon in the top right corner of the screen.
3. Select "Account" from the dropdown menu.
4. Scroll down to the "Account Info" section.
5. Click on "Update Personal Info."
6. Enter your new name in the "First name" and "Last name" fields.
7. Click "Save Changes" to update your information.

**Tips:**

* Make sure you're signed in to the correct account and profile before making changes.
* If you have multiple profiles on Netflix or Hulu, you may need to update each profile separately.
* If you're having trouble updating your name, you can contact Netflix or Hulu customer support for assistance.

By following these steps, you should be able to update your name on both Netflix and Hulu. Let me know if you have any further questions or need help with anything else!
